snippet.title: Tumble Troopers
snippet.description:
Are you ready for a chaotic online PvP shooter?
Tumble Troopers is a class-based TPS packed with fun and action. Experience large-scale multiplayer and unpredictable physics-based gameplay, where tactics are the route to victory. It is a mobile-first PvP game featuring an approachable experience with simple controls and shooting mechanics.

Pick a class, and work together with your team towards victory. Earn experiences to unlock customization options for tailored combat! The class system enables choosing among assault, medic, support, and scout roles.
• Assault is an anti-vehicle and close-quarters specialist. 
• Medic specializes in healing and reviving infantry. 
• Support focuses on vehicle repairs and heavy weapons. 
• Scout provides long-distance firepower and area denial.

Victory in battles primarily relies on smart strategic thinking rather than pure skill. Crafty players will harness the environment to their advantage, turning explosive barrels and searing lava into ingenious traps against their opponents. The game’s physics empowers you to dodge, grab, climb, execute breathtaking flips and so much more. However, remain vigilant amidst explosions, for close encounters can be dangerous. These elements promise an experience that is as rich as unpredictable, consistently revitalizing the thrill of gameplay.

Enjoy the chaotic online multiplayer action!

Connect with us! 
Follow @tumbletroopers on social media.
Join our discord server:  https://discord.gg/JFjRFXmuCd

Download on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fi.criticalforce.tumbletroopers&hl=en&gl=US

#mobilegame #pvp #gameplay
